descr.p: Provides search engines for local and remote Gopher content.
Specify a subdirectory of the Gopher server to limit the search to.
For multiple searches within different subdirectories, create descendants class of TGopherSearch.

element.name: TGopherRemoteSearch.URI
element.short: Gopher URI of remote server to search

element.name: TGopherRemoteSearch.Host
element.short: Host name of remote server to search

element.name: TGopherRemoteSearch.Port
element.short: Port remote server is listening on

element.name: TGopherRemoteSearch.Selector
element.short: Selector of directory to start remote search in
